title: Delete a member from a BC

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json"

parameters.name: user_id Conditional
parameters.description: User ID. Note : For members that have accepted the invitation to join the Business Center, delete by user_id . For members that haven't accepted the invitation, delete by user_email .

parameters.name: user_email Conditional
parameters.description: User email. Note : For members that have accepted the invitation to join the Business Center, delete by user_id . For members that haven't accepted the invitation, delete by user_email .
